Class Graph

java.lang.Object
  cs303.Graph

public class Graph
extends java.lang.Object

A class to represent simple undirected graphs

public Graph(java.lang.String fileName)
Constructor for graph from OFF file.

Parameters:

Graph

public Graph(int C,
             int D,
             int B)
Constructor for graph with C number of connected components, D depth per component and B branching factor (maximum number of children at each node).

Parameters:
C - Number of connected components
D - Depth of graph (depth of graph interpretted as a tree with the "root" of each component as the root of the tree)
B - Branching factor
